text: Fernando de Santiago y Díaz de Mendívil (July 23, 1910 - November 6, 1994) was a conservative Spanish politician. He was the deputy and interim prime minister of Spain during the Spanish transition to democracy in the late 1970s. He had earlier been a general in the Spanish Civil War and under the dictatorship of Francisco Franco. title: Fernando de Santiago y Díaz
